snippet.title: Robin Hood 2: The Siege PS2 gameplay ( Phoenix Games ) 720p
snippet.description:
Heres a first test run of Robin Hood 2 The Siege on the Sony Playstation 2. Bought to us by Phoenix Games. I was expecting a lot more from this game,but when i pushed the start button i realised i was playing a badly made point n shoot coin op  conversion rip off. You get presented with some text based storyline (what else do we expect from the infamous Phoenix??) and then thrown into a slightly moveable screen in order to shoot bad guys (that just appear to run left to right) for no apparent reason at all! The game is pretty much crazy chicken x with suits of armour! As you can probably tell....im not in any rush to play this game again anytime soon! A longer playthrough will be on demand only! 
If you want to see some more exciting Phoenix Games releases,or more retro gaming videos, please check out my channel, and subscribe
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNZylG5ZROX7uhBo-GjnHqg

Robin Hood 2: The Siege was released by Phoenix Games on the Sony PS2 console and was recorded with the HD PVR2 by SHLIMPOLE & WIGGY G
